name: Mega Caveman
description:
Mega Caveman is a small game with a big boss

  • Battle and jump your way through 3 levels
  • Find all of the secret eggs hidden in the levels
  • Fight the terrifying final DINOSAUR boss

Hope you enjoy :)

Controls

Arrows - Move

Space - Jump

Left Control - Shoot

Tab - Main Menu 

This is the updated project. Now polished and finished.
